Package org.apache.aries.application

Interface Summary
ApplicationMetadata A representation of an APPLICATION.MF file.
ApplicationMetadataFactory Provides various means of generating ApplicationMetadata instances.
Content A representation of content metadata such as Application-Content, Import-Package, etc
DeploymentContent An entry in DEPLOYMENT.MF's Deployed-Content header
DeploymentMetadata Represents the parsed contents of a DEPLOYMENT.MF file
DeploymentMetadataFactory Methods for creating a DeploymentMetadata instance
ServiceDeclaration Represents a service imported or exported by an Aries application.
VersionRange A representation of a Version Range.
 

Exception Summary
InvalidAttributeException
